page.title: 09JONATHAN DIMBLEBY
page.content: Mr. Dimbleby is a television broad_ caster. He broadcasts on a variety of subjects, mostly current affairs. He has visited 50 different countries, enjoys his work but is concerned that his family worry about him while he is away. He was born in Aylesbury, Bucks in l944 and his father was Richard Dimbleby, a famous broadcaster. Jonathan Dimbleby lived in London before moving to Swainswick. They moved here to be near his wife's family.He stays home in his spare time and doesn't watch a lot of T.V. He plays tennis. He is very keen on history. He feels that the proposed bypass will spoil a beautiful part of the country and will increase the number of lorries and therefore the noise. He uses the A.46 four or five times a day.
